General.Name: Irving Resources Inc
General.Description: Irving Resources Inc., a junior exploration stage company, focuses on the gold exploring activities in Japan. The company holds interest in the Omui gold-silver property that covers an area of 2.98 square kilometers; the Shimokawa property covering an area of 48.50 square kilometers; the Engaru property that covers an area of 84.42 square kilometers; the Noto property covering an area of 337.37 square kilometers; the Yamagano property; and the Eniwa project, which comprises an area of 56.15 square kilometers located in Japan. Irving Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 999 Canada Place, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3E2
